description: This file defines a React functional component for a user registration page in a front-end application. It handles user input for name, email, and password, submits registration data to an API, and redirects upon success.

methods.name: RegisterPage
methods.description: React functional component rendering a registration form with state management and submission handling.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Asynchronous function handling form submission, calling the registration API, and redirecting on success.
